member.name: T:Vector.CANoe.Sockets.OnIpSendPrepareAttribute
member.summary: Mark a method with this attribute, and it will be called right before a packet will be sent by the TCP/IP stack.
member.remarks: The method must take two parameters which are of type and . The method must be a instance method and it must have a return type.

member.name: T:Vector.CANoe.Sockets.OnIpReceivePrepareAttribute
member.summary: Mark a method with this attribute, and it will be called right before a received packet will be dispatched to the TCP/IP stack.
member.remarks: The method must take a single parameter which is of type . The method must be a instance method and it must have a return type.
